title: Job Vacancies at TippyToes KidCare Nursery and Daycare
content:
TippyToes KidCare Nursery and Daycare is a state-of-the-art Nursery that provides high quality education, enhanced development learning skills, and a world-class play environment for kids in Abuja, Nigeria.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) French Teacher

Job Location: Garki II, Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are looking for a French teacher to deliver French lessons to children in early years.
	The school requires an enthusiastic French teacher who will be able to engage children ages two to five years old while teaching them French.
	The applicant should be a native French speaker or fluent in French to be eligible for this position.
	Working in an early years setting with a previous experience working as a French teacher within this phase is an advantage.


Responsibilities


	The position is charged with the responsibility of maintaining a detailed record of each child's progress.
	Keep abreast of educational developments.
	Keep accurate and updated on-going records and prepare reports.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a Bachelor's Degree qualification.
	Must possess at least 4 years of Early Years Teaching experience with qualified documented Certification.
	Must be a female.
	Must reside in Abuja.
	Ability to work outside regular office hours including weekends, holidays or any other days as required and must possess strong interpersonal skills.
	Be enthusiastic and passionate about teaching and be able to demonstrate a genuine care for young children.
	Prepare to plan and develop programs that would cater for the educational needs of children in early years learning.
	Ability to incorporate a variety of teaching and learning strategies.
	Ability to maintain a supportive and encouraging team environment.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: vacancy@tippytoeskidcare.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

2.) Accountant

Job Location: Abuja
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	Management and reconciliation of the school's account including expenditure management and tracking.
	Financial reporting and documentation.
	Undertake a range of administrative and logistic duties to ensure the smooth running of the school.


Requirements


	Must have a B.Sc in Accounting with a minimum of 2nd Class Upper Division.
	Must possess at least 3 years of post-qualification experience, particularly with any reputable accounting firm and not more than 35 years old.
	Must have good interpersonal skills and the ability to multi-task.
	Additional professional qualification is an added advantage.
	Must be a resident in Abuja
	Applicant must possess Excellent Oral and Written English communication skills.
	The ability to spontaneously engage in articulated communication between children, parents and colleagues is a must.
	Must possess the ability to prepare/keep accurate and updated on-going detailed records/reports of each child's overall progress.
	Must be proficient in the use of QUICK BOOKS accounting software.
	Ability to work outside regular office hours including weekends, holidays or any other days as required and must possess strong interpersonal skills.
	Computer Proficiency is Compulsory.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: vacancy@tippytoeskidcare.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

3.) Nursery Early Years Teaching Assistant

Job Location: Abuja
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Details


	We are in the process of recruiting a dynamic, self-motivated, enthusiastic candidate of any ethnicity for immediate employment in the capacity belowas a Nursery Early Years Teaching Assistant.


Responsibilities


	The candidate should be passionate about developing exciting and relevant learning experiences for children both indoors and outdoors using the provided scheme of work.
	Prepare to plan and develop programs that would cater for the educational needs of children in early years learning.
	Ability to incorporate a variety of teaching and learning strategies.
	Able to maintain open communication between parents and work colleagues in building and maintaining a supportive and encouraging team environment.
	Keep abreast of educational developments.
	Keep accurate and updated on-going records and prepare reports.
	The position is charged with the responsibility of maintaining a detailed record of each child's progress.


Requirements


	The preferred candidate must have a minimum of a (B. Ed) or (B.Sc.).
	Must possess at least 2 years EYFS Teaching experience.
	Must have a minimum of 2 years in teaching early years.
	A certificate in Montessori Education is an added advantage.
	Must be computer proficient
	The candidate should also be committed to working in close partnership with parents.
	Qualified documented certification / diploma in British & Montessori Educational curriculum.
	Ability to work outside regular office hours including weekends, holidays or any other days as required and must possess strong interpersonal skills.
	Be enthusiastic and passionate about teaching and be able to demonstrate genuine care for young children.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: vacancy@tippytoeskidcare.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Social Media Manager Job at Raphael Group




        
    

        
        Raphael Group - Our client, IVVI Clinic, is recruiting suitable candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media Manager

Job Location: Lekki Phase 1, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Description
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	This is a full-time onsite role, ideal for someone living within or around Lekki Phase 1 with proven experience managing business social media pages.
	IVVI Clinic is looking for a creative and organized Social Media Manager to handle the clinic’s online presence, engage clients, and handle appointment communications.
	The ideal candidate understands how to blend aesthetics with strategy,creating engaging content that reflects the clinic’s brand, drives client inquiries, and supports day-to-day communication with patients and prospects.
	This role involves developing and executing a social media strategy that promotes IVVI Clinic’s services, engages followers, and strengthens brand visibility.
	You’ll manage all social media pages, respond to inquiries, schedule appointments, and coordinate with internal staff to ensure consistent, quality online representation.


Key Responsibilities


	Manage and grow the clinic’s social media pages (Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, etc.).
	Create, post, and schedule engaging content (images, videos, captions, stories, and reels).
	Respond promptly to messages, comments, and inquiries.
	Set and confirm client appointments through social platforms and calls.
	Work with the Head Nurse and management to align content with clinic goals.
	Track engagement metrics and provide periodic performance reports.
	Maintain a professional and friendly tone in all communications.
	Stay updated on beauty, wellness, and healthcare social trends.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a Bachelor's Degree with 3 years of work experience.
	Must reside within Lekki Phase 1 or nearby areas for easy daily commute.
	Candidates must be available to work 4–5 days a week, from 11 AM to 6 PM, Tuesdays through Saturdays
	Must be proactive, reliable, and able to start immediately.


Required Skills & Competencies:


	Strong knowledge of Instagram, TikTok, and other major platforms.
	Excellent communication and writing skills.
	Ability to create visually appealing and on-brand content.
	Good photography/videography sense (using phone or camera).
	Time management and multitasking skills.
	Customer service mindset and attention to detail.


Salary
N150,000 - N190,000 monthly.
